segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on her task, it's almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is creating such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is patiently waiting for her treat, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is wobbling, it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in a breeze, it must feel nice in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter are clean and ready to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being very sneaky, but also very clever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so well-maintained, it's a lovely view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this scene is a snapshot of a moment that could go wrong at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR
